name: Anime Vampire Slayer
description:
Take Control of two characters with the goal of defeating all vampires! Protect The Cat Girl with the Knight as they take on hordes of Vampires.
Deep Story, Complex mechanics, Riveting character arcs, if thats what you want then gtfo this is a shallow game with shallow intent for you, you weeb.

This is an arcade style sword hunter. With one controller you defend Kariko the beautiful cat girl princess. With the other hand control her faithful knight Siya. Both have set out to destroy the vampires who have invaded their lands.

Your goal is to use Siya to defend Kariko against Vampires and reach a high score. The Vampires come in waves which gradually increase in difficulty.

Cat girl Kariko
-Will take damage when a Vampire makes direct contact. Has five health points, once she has no hearts your score is calculated and the map reset. So keep her far away from vampires.
-Has no defense. Keep her away from Vampires and use Siya to keep them away for good.
-Keeps track of score and high score. Kariko is also a hub for UI elements you need.


Knight Siya
-Siya is unaffected by vampires.
-The Controllers trigger will activate an attack. Any vampire that gets too close will be destroyed.
-Attack and kill vampires with the holy blade of Neph'aro.
-The knight will interact with UI elements. Use Siyas slash to smash UI buttons.
